name: All Draggy Dogs Go To Heaven
name_original: All Draggy Dogs Go To Heaven
description:
Tim Ruswick has murdered Draggy Dog. Oh no!!! Rick Davidson and the gang get together to brainstorm. Draggy has to cross the River Styx in the underworld, and make it to the other side to get to heaven. After all, all (draggy) dogs go to heaven!

Help Draggy Dog escape the grips of Charon, the ferryman of Hades who carries the souls of the damned across River Styx to their eternal resting place. 

Use WASD to move, Space to Jump. Avoid the walls and rocks, and make it to the finish line!

Github source code link: https://github.com/MetalancA/AllDraggyDogsGoToHeaven
